description: Try our easy to follow Honey Sesame Pork recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pork stir-fry,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Pork,Low sugar,Low fat
name: Honey Sesame Pork Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g snow peas, trimmed cut into matchsticks

recipeInstructions.text: Cut shallots into 4cm lengths. Cut carrot into matchsticks. Slice snow peas into 2 or 3 pieces on the diagonal. Cut baby corn in half lengthways.

Heat wok or frying pan over a high heat. Add oil. Cook pork in batches, for 2-3 mins or until golden brown. Remove from wok. Add vegetables to wok and toss over heat for 1 minute. Add 1 tablespoon of water, cover and cook for 1 minute until vegetables are just tender.
Prepare noodles as per packet instructions. Return pork to pan with stir-fry sauce and noodles and toss until well combined and heated through.
